props.name: url
props.description: The URL to display in the Safari address bar

props.name: imageSrc
props.description: The source URL of the image to display in the Safari window

props.name: videoSrc
props.description: The source URL of the video to display in the Safari window

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the Safari window

props.name: height
props.description: The height of the Safari window

props.name: mode
props.description: The display mode of the Safari window.
